title: Sophia via Nika - A Commentary on Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke
description: Sam, Luke, Julian, Nate, and Michael discuss the recent conversation between Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke. They discuss the tenor of the conversation, why it's so different from Jordan's other conversations, and what we can learn from it.
